sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Dow topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Dow has lost about 24.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is American Express, trading down 2.0%.
American Express is lower by about 18.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 1.3%, and Procter & Gamble, trading up 0.9% on the day.
